Class ViewManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.ViewManagerController
public class ViewManagerController extends Object
Controller class for managing the main view and navigation logic. Handles loading sidebars, content pages, and user interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewManagerController

      public ViewManagerController()

  • Method Details

    • initAfterLogin

      public void initAfterLogin() throws IOException
      Initializes the view manager after login. Loads the sidebar and content pages based on the user's role.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading resources.

    • handleDetailButton

      public void handleDetailButton(Shuttle shuttle) throws IOException
      Handles the action of showing the details page for a specific shuttle. Updates the details controller with the selected shuttle.
      Parameters:
      shuttle - The shuttle to be displayed in the details view.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the details page.

    • handleBestellenButton

      public void handleBestellenButton()
      Handles the action of showing the storage page. Updates the sidebar selection.

    • showHome

      public void showHome()
      Displays the home page based on the user's role. Initializes and loads the home page content.

    • setClientRequests

      public void setClientRequests(ClientRequests clientRequests)
      Sets the `ClientRequests` instance for handling server requests.
      Parameters:
      clientRequests - The `ClientRequests` instance to be set.

    • handleLogout

      public void handleLogout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the logout action. Closes the current stage and displays the login view.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the logout button.

    • handleSidebarNavigation

      public void handleSidebarNavigation(String buttonId)
      Handles navigation based on the sidebar button clicked. Displays the corresponding page and updates the sidebar selection.
      Parameters:
      buttonId - The ID of the button clicked.

    • setContent

      public void setContent(javafx.scene.Parent kommentarPage)
      Sets the content of the content area to the specified page. Ensures the page is visible and added to the content area if not already present.
      Parameters:
      kommentarPage - The page to be displayed.
